participant_1.background:
I feel the most confident when I'm wearing makeup and listening to Charlie Daniels.
I can remember listening to my parents' Beatles record over and over again.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
my parents both are school teachers.
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.

participant_2.background:
I don't talk to my dad because he's a deadbeat, but I love the color pink!
i now live in new mexico.
I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner.
Social media is not my thing.
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.

content.text: Not much. Just got back from a roadtrip to see my sister Madonna, who is also my business partner. What have you been up to?

I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could. It was exhilarating! It was my last day of vacation, so I decided to go all out. I'm actually a bit sad that it's over. I'm single and live in the city, so I don't get to do stuff like that very often.

Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you enjoyed yourself. I wish I could go on a roadtrip. My dad is a deadbeat, so I don't have a car. I also don't talk to him because he's never been there for me. I live in New Mexico with my mom, who is a school teacher. She's the only parent I have left.

Wow, that must be tough. I'm glad you have your mom to support you. I'm not really a fan of social media either. I think it's a waste of time. I'd rather spend my time doing things I enjoy, like listening to music and painting.

I love music too! I used to be in a band, but we broke up a few years ago. I still play music for fun, though. I also love to sell cosmetics. I help my sister Madonna with her beauty business. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.

That's awesome! I'm glad you have something you're passionate about. I'm a bit of a loner, so I don't really do much with other people. I like to spend my time alone, listening to music and painting. I'm also really into my job. I'm a makeup artist, and I love creating beautiful looks for people.

That sounds really cool! I've never been a very good artist, but I can appreciate it when I see it. I'm really glad we had this conversation. It's nice to meet someone who shares some of my interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet new people
